pr_title: Keep BA AP weapons matched to their mount in the blk file.

timeline.message:
Keep BA AP weapons matched to their mount in the blk file.

AP weapons are listed immediately after the AP mount or armored glove they belong to and linked during
loading.

timeline.bodyText: Entity#addEquipment never returns null. It can throw an exception, but it is guaranteed to be non-null in the try block. The test was confusing code analysis tools into flagging subsequent dereferences as potential NPEs.
timeline.author: neoancient
